analytic.title: Nuovi frammenti greci di Severo di Antiochia dai manoscritti delle catene dei profeti

biblStruct.note: The paper contains the first critical edition of six Greek fragments of Severus of Antioch, from the exegetical catenae to the prophets Isaiah, Ezechiel, and Daniel. These fragments were indicated by Michael von Faulhaber at the end of 20th century, but were still unpublished. The author tries to contextualize these fragments in the extant production of Severus, which is mainly preserved in Syriac translation

body.bibl: Cattaneo, Gianmario. “Nuovi Frammenti Greci Di Severo Di Antiochia Dai Manoscritti Delle Catene Dei Profeti.” Prometheus NS 8 [45] (2019): 281–89.
Gianmario Cattaneo, Nuovi Frammenti Greci Di Severo Di Antiochia Dai Manoscritti Delle Catene Dei Profeti, Prometheus NS 8 [45] (2019): 281–89.
